summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; and providing for the purchase of certain property and property rights in King, Snohomish, and Whatcom Counties, as a right of way, for an electric transmission line to be made as provided in certain right of way easements heretofore obtained and designating the same as an addition, betterment and extension contemplated by Ordinance No. 54006; appropriating funds therefor, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 56008 and 54026.
